steps.conclusion: Title violates explicit rule for language exams. It must be exactly the exam name, but provided "Preparação para o TOEFL" instead of "TOEFL". This also conflicts with the expectation to avoid titles like "Preparatório para o TOEFL". Consequently, the english_title should also have been "TOEFL" rather than "TOEFL Preparation".

None beyond the title/english_title issue. The output is in Portuguese, includes exactly one suggestion, is_language_course=true, includes TOEFL, icon has tabler- prefix, title is <=5 words, and description is a single Portuguese sentence.

- Change title to "TOEFL" to comply with the language exam rule and expectations.
- Set english_title to "TOEFL" to match the corrected title.
- Keep is_language_course=true, icon prefix, and Portuguese description as they are.
